bike.description: A6-SL Quarternary-phase custom-butted alloy, hydroformed top and down tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube

components.description: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted w/ sealed bearing pivots, low-leverage suspended rockers, FSR 80mm (13"-15") 100mm travel (17"-19"), cold-forged dropout w/ CNC'd disc mount and replaceable hanger
Manitou Marvel Comp TS air w/ tapered alloy steerer, lockout, 80mm travel (13"-15") 100mm travel (17"-19")
Manitou Radium Expert w/ lockout
Shimano Deore, M590 w/ integrated spindle, 42/32/24T
Shimano cartridge bearings
Shimano Deore, M591, 34.9mm
Shimano SLX, M675 SGS Shadow top normal, 10-speed
Shimano Deore, M591 Rapid Fire, 10-speed
Shimano Deore HG62, 11-36T, 10-speed
KMC X10, 10-speed
Shimano M435 32H Center Lock disc hubs, Vera Terra DPD22 rims
Schwalbe Racing Ralph, 26" x 2.1" folding, 67 tpi
Shimano Deore M445, hydraulic disc, 160mm rotor
Shimano Deore M446 hydraulic
FSA 1 1/8" - 1.5", sealed cartridge bearings
Oval M100, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 640mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M213, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval dual-density Kraton
Oval Womens W400 w/ Cro-Moly rails
Oval M200, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
